name: ELECTRONIC PAYMENTS COALITION
description: coalition dedicated to protecting consumer choice and competition in payments
sampleDescriptions:
Financial CHOICE Act, a bill to replaceP.L. 111-203 Dodd-Frank Wall Street Reform and Consumer Protection Act, all provisions related payment card transactions; no bill number.
Issues related to the implementation of PL 111-24 "Credit Card Accountability Responsibility and Disclosure Act of 2009, all provisions pertaining to interchange.
Issues related to the implementation of PL 111-203 Dodd-Frank Wall Street Reform and Consumer Protection Act, all provisions pertaining to the provisions in Title X-Bureau of Consumer Financial Protection relating to interchange.
